entry.title: Fabri-kal - RK5 - 5 Oz Cold Cup Translucent - 25 x 100 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dart
Type: Disposables
Price: 89.99

An essential addition to your high-traffic concession stand, snack bar, or casual catered event, this translucent plastic cup combines double sidewall ribbing for added strength and an easy grip, with an economical translucent polystyrene construction, fit for your bottom line. It's sturdy and shatterproof, yet flexible, making it easy to handle and to store, unlike cups of a more delicate material. Plus, it features a rolled rim at the top that creates a smooth surface for sipping.

This cup is great for on-the-go cold beverage or slushy service, especially when combined with a compatible lid. It practically sells your drinks for you with a translucent clarity that enhances product appeal to increase impulse sales. At the same time, the cup's primarily flush-fill capacity further increases profitability, ensuring proper portion control of your most popular beverages.

Fabri-kal - RK5 - 5 Oz Cold Cup Translucent - 2500 / Case
